description.english: This is just the beginning...
Happy to see you in your second round!
Third time's the charm!
May the Fourth be with you.
Hi Fiiiiiive!
Ocelot's favorite amount of Rounds.
You're getting a hang of it don't you?
It's a Full byte now!
Light of the Nine divines upon you.
Absolute Cinema
And still going strong...
You took the life of 50 entities you have no idea what they are.
100 Enemies killed. So tragic...
Five hundred stars? You're a god.
Oh you finally won, Cute little pinkie.
This is a balanced one.
Much potential, This one has.
I cherish you, How did you even do this?
I played with more than 500 enemies in one round. You this cannot be possible, Right?
Here comes the 3am logic failure.
You won your first round, Yaaaay!
Not bad for a second win, I say.
You're getting much better at this!
400% Stars collected.
Five is good, Five is great.
It's just ordinary now, Right?
Guess what comes before Eleven.
Hear this absolutely revolutionary joke: You know what happens if Eight sleeps? It becomes Infinite.
Sometimes it's all just the nines we had together...
Nothing stays hidden from me, Nothing.
Liberated the entire galaxy.
When they say your name, Does it cut to the show's logo?
Congrats on playing a total amount of 18000000000000 Nano seconds.
Love. You.
